response.original_title: 映画ドラえもん のび太の新恐竜
response.overview: Nobita accidentally finds a fossil dinosaur egg mixed with rocks in the dinosaur fossil exhibition site that he had visited before. He returns it to its original state with the 'time blanket'.
response.title: Doraemon: Nobita's New Dinosaur

titles.title: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's New Dinosaur

release_dates.note: Was originally scheduled to release on March 6, 2020, but was delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic.
